title: BombSquad
description:
8 Player Party Game Madness!
Blow up your friends in mini-games ranging from capture-the-flag to hockey.
Featuring gratuitous explosions, advanced ragdoll face-plant physics, pirates, ninjas, barbarians, insane chefs, and more.
Supports PS3 controllers, XBox 360 controllers, most USB/Bluetooth gamepads, and even iOS and Android devices as controllers via the free 'BombSquad Remote' app.
Bombs Away!

Version history:
1.4.123 - Account unlinking & bug fixes
1.4.116 - Bug fixes
1.4.113 - Bug fixes
1.4.105 - Shields now lose health over time and spinning too long causes you to pass out
1.4.99 - Better language support in net-games
1.4.98 - New netplay features such as kick votes
1.4.94 - More netplay performance improvements
1.4.93 - Netplay performance improvements
1.4.88 - Public internet parties
1.4.69 - Bug fixes and polishing
1.4.66 - Easter edition!
1.4.62 - new characters and bug fixes
1.4.47 - bug fixes
1.4.38 - bug fixes
1.4.32 - more icons, bug fixes, and UI improvements
1.4.17 - new global player profiles and custom icons
1.4.16 - added continues and polishing
1.4.14 - bug fixes
1.4.11 - New tournament and league functionality
1.4.9 - Santa and Frosty are back for the holidays! Also a new map and new tournament.
1.4.8 - added Bernard the Bear and new tournament types
overview: Released in September 2017 by Eric Froemling.

products.name: BombSquad Pro
products.description: Doubles tickets earned in-game, gives a power-ranking bonus, and more..
